apex_test_suite_add_text: SFDX: Add Tests to Apex Test Suite
apex_test_last_class_run_text: SFDX: Re-Run Last Run Apex Test Class
apex_test_last_method_run_text: SFDX: Re-Run Last Run Apex Test Method
apex_test_suite_name_not_determined_mess: Suite name could not be determined for suite execution
apex_test_suite_debug_not_supported_mess: Test suites cannot be debugged. Please debug individual test classes or methods.
apex_testing_discovery_source_descriptio: Select the source for Apex test discovery.
apex_testing_discovery_source_ls_descrip: Use the Language Server (LS) for discovery.
apex_testing_discovery_source_api_descri: Use the Tooling API Test Discovery endpoint for discovery.
apex_testing_use_test_explorer_descripti: Use the VS Code Test Explorer for Apex tests. When enabled, the new Test Explorer UI will be shown instead of the traditional Apex Test View.
apex_test_output_format_description: Format for test result reports. Markdown provides rich formatting with tables and code blocks. Text provides plain text output for minimal environments.
apex_test_output_format_markdown_descrip: Markdown format with tables, code blocks, and rich formatting (default)
apex_test_output_format_text_description: Plain text format for minimal environments
apex_test_sort_order_description: Sort order for test results in reports. Runtime sorts by execution time (slowest first), Coverage sorts by code coverage (lowest first), Severity sorts by combined issues (worst first).
apex_test_sort_order_runtime_description: Sort by runtime - slowest tests first (default)
apex_test_sort_order_coverage_descriptio: Sort by coverage - lowest coverage first
apex_test_sort_order_severity_descriptio: Sort by severity - tests with both poor performance and poor coverage first
apex_test_performance_threshold_descript: Performance threshold in milliseconds. Tests taking longer than this threshold will be highlighted as poorly performing. Default is 5000ms (5 seconds).
apex_test_coverage_threshold_description: Coverage threshold as a percentage. Tests with coverage below this threshold will be highlighted as poorly covered. Default is 75%.
retrieve_test_code_coverage_text: Specifies whether code coverage results are calculated and retrieved when you run Apex tests.
